title: 游戏非正常退出，原因未知
author: Koroding1
txt_content:
求解答：整合包为晓夜多辅助Mod整合包（贴上有）
Mod如下：





QQ图片20181118145220.png (208.55 KB, 下载次数: 0)

下载附件

2018-11-18 14:50 上传








QQ图片20181118145226.png (205.76 KB, 下载次数: 0)

下载附件

2018-11-18 14:50 上传








QQ图片20181118145229.png (212.26 KB, 下载次数: 0)

下载附件

2018-11-18 14:50 上传





错误报告如下:

[14:40:26] [main/WARN]: Skipping bad option: lastServer:
[14:40:30] [main/WARN]: Mod betterfoliage is missing the required element 'version' and a version.properties file could not be found. Falling back to metadata version 2.1.8
[14:40:31] [main/WARN]: Mod codechickenlib is missing the required element 'version' and a version.properties file could not be found. Falling back to metadata version 3.1.5.331

[14:40:33] [main/WARN]: Mod veinminer is missing the required element 'version' and a version.properties file could not be found. Falling back to metadata version 0.38.1
[14:40:33] [main/WARN]: Mod veinminermodsupport is missing the required element 'version' and a version.properties file could not be found. Falling back to metadata version 0.38.1
[14:40:52] [main/WARN]: ResourcePack: ignored non-lowercase namespace: CREDITS.txt in E:\BaiduYunDownload\[1.12.2]xxx整合包\.minecraft\mods\aether_ii-1.12.2-1.1.12.jar
[14:40:52] [main/WARN]: ResourcePack: ignored non-lowercase namespace: LICENSE in E:\BaiduYunDownload\[1.12.2]xxx整合包\.minecraft\mods\aether_ii-1.12.2-1.1.12.jar

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content:
Koroding1 发表于 2018-11-18 15:25
谢谢。如果想保留该如何解决
目测是mod的配置写错了

也许能在名为 config 的文件夹下，找到名为 quark 的文件夹，删掉它，也许能解决。

如果不行，干脆删除mod

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content: 我需要 crash-reports 文件夹下的崩溃报告

replies.author: Koroding1
